title: FLEX: Layout - Page Content with Sidebar

sub_fields.label: Image original size
sub_fields.name: image_original_size
sub_fields.instructions: Force image to its original size

sub_fields.label: Vimeo Instructions
sub_fields.message: Please copy paste the code from the Vimeo video url. For example please see this video url: https://vimeo.com/355402411. The code we need is "355402411".

sub_fields.label: Youtube Instructions
sub_fields.message: Please copy paste the code from the youtube video url. For example please see this video url: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XbNTv1x1HmE#action=share. The code we need is "XbNTv1x1HmE".
